documents.document: @British_Airways LHR looking as lovely as ever
@vickyfoxcroft well done for voting with the way your constituency did !!!
So had slippy peg this morning; couldn't work out why. Then I found a snail on it and snail goo, will have to add this to my preride checks!
@jhr187 Genuine feedback old fruit
.@British_Airways sigh. Two flights now in club with much reduced service as purser has to release crew to flog sandwiches #toflytocharge
@carolkirkwood @BBCRadio2 @BBCBreakfast Thank you :))
@carolkirkwood @BBCRadio2 @BBCBreakfast Great where is St Mary's
@British_Airways Flying in March I look forward to seeing the new facilities and lounge. Would be great to see some pics of your new home!
@theroyalparks Ah no there are roadworks at The Mall / Marlbro. Junction and there appears to be a no right turn from The Mall into MR
.@theroyalparks Hey roadworks on The Mall at Marlborough Road, Is there now no right turn ??? What are you doing?

@BTPClifford Yup sure is
.@EE You having issues with network W1J ?

@BBCTomEdwards @CarolinePidgeon Great - a total waste of space and eye sore

Utter chaos out there!

Wow loads of old class 90s sat unused at Crewe

.@British_Airways at £2.30 for a cup of tea I beg to differ #ToFlyToCharge
.@British_Airways you have hacked off a lot of loyal exec customers #toflytocharge
.@British_Airways no issues with food but charging £2.30 for a cup of tea is outrageous let alone £6 for a G&T 1/2
@captainchaos_ Oh very nice! we need to meet up for a cuppa someday
@captainchaos_ @British_Airways hopefully before January! otherwise its #ToFlyToCharge

#ToFlyToCharge

.@British_Airways @WhatTheBearSays yup same service as @easyJet @Ryanair but more expensive - this might kill short haul

@jhr187 When do they change your badge to say "To Fly, To Charge"?
.@British_Airways @Putneybiker well now there is no point and you might as well book with the low cost carriers - as they will be cheaper!
@jhr187 well not for me - but could be for your employer.
@Putneybiker @British_Airways but you now not even being offered a drink!
.@British_Airways you have just sadly become a low cost carrier - such a shame
.@British_Airways @lizziemintcake There new moto "To Fly, To Charge"
.@yourHeathrow @HeathrowAirport wouldnt worry about it, everyone will be boycotting @British_Airways now anyway
.@British_Airways wow - a serious step in the wrong direction https://t.co/u6i8QXOakm (I wont be looking to renew my silver!)
